  collapse = TRUE,

                         "chariotViz",
                         "vignettes")

```{r setup}
library(chariotViz)
```

```{r,cache=T}
omop_relationships <- 
  fetch_omop(version_key = get_version_key())

print(omop_relationships)
```

```{r}
omop_nodes_and_edges <- 
  create_nodes_and_edges(omop_relationships = omop_relationships)

print(omop_nodes_and_edges)
```


```{r}
omop_nodes_and_edges <- 
  omop_nodes_and_edges %>% 
  add_tooltip()

print(omop_nodes_and_edges)
```


```{r}
omop_nodes_and_edges <- 
  omop_nodes_and_edges %>%
  map_node_attributes()

print(omop_nodes_and_edges)
```

```{r}
omop_nodes_and_edges <- 
  omop_nodes_and_edges %>% 
  map_edge_attributes()

print(omop_nodes_and_edges)
```

```{r}
omop_graph <- 
  construct_graph(omop_nodes_and_edges)

print(omop_graph)
```
